page.title: 19SCHOOL LESSONS, WINGERWORTH
page.content:
At{Hunloke Park}we work as a class, in groups or individually, depending on what we are doing. Our timetable is very flexible but these are our main areas of study:{ { { Language, Maths, Religious Education, { Environmental Studies}- Science, History and Geography.{Creative { Pursuits -}Art,Music, Movement, Drama { Physical Activities}-Games,Gymnastics
Music is important in school. We have our own{orchestra}which includes recorders, percussion, violins, cellos and a double bass. We also have a {Choir}and a{Guitar Club. Other after school clubs include {Football, Netball, Cricket, Indoor {Games, Gymnastics, Hockey, Athletics {and Chess.
